abstract: Because he wore a Yankees cap, a young Libyan who may -- or may not -- have helped capture Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi attracted greater-than-expected interest from some news outlets.
snippet: Because he wore a Yankees cap, a young Libyan who may -- or may not -- have helped capture Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi attracted greater-than-expected interest from some news outlets.
lead_paragraph: It takes a lot to draw attention away from a golden gun.

headline.main: At Scene of Qaddafi's Capture, a Yankees Cap Is Conspicuous
